participant_1.name: Oliver
participant_1.personality: Creative and introspective, often lost in thoughts about art and self-expression.
participant_1.background: My favorite animal is a dog, but I've been with my lizard Gila for the longest time. I don't play an instrument but I enjoy listening to music, especially The Lumineers. I have trouble feeling emotion. I sell miscellaneous stuff in local fairs. I love watching Gila chase the sunbeams around my living room.

participant_2.name: Sophie
participant_2.personality: Nurturing and dedicated, always putting others' needs before her own.
participant_2.background: I have to work, but I'm bringing my blender to make my own iced coffee! I sometimes neglect my own needs in order to be there for my kids. I studied business as my major. I enjoy wearing comfortable, loose clothing that allows me to move around easily in my wheelchair. I'm a teacher who cares about my students' success.

content.text: What's up?
Just getting ready for work. I have to teach today, but I'm excited because I get to make my own iced coffee!
Oh that's awesome! What do you teach?
I teach business to high school students.
Oh that's cool! I wish I had more business education.
It's definitely helpful!
Yeah, I'm more of a creative type. I sell miscellaneous stuff at local fairs.
Oh that's really cool! What kind of stuff do you sell?
I sell a little bit of everything, but mostly art and jewelry.
Oh that's awesome! I love art and jewelry.
Thanks! I love making it!
I bet! It must be really rewarding to see your creations come to life.
It definitely is!
That's awesome! What's your favorite thing about your work?
I love being able to make something out of nothing. I also love seeing my customers happy with my work.
That's great! I'm sure your customers appreciate your work.
Thanks! I try my best.
I bet you do!
I try!
Well, it sounds like you have a really cool job!
Thanks! I really enjoy it.
That's awesome
